Razor Claw transformed to Wolverine mode and in a blink of time he shot out=
 of the room into the hallway. 

Foxfingers waited hoping that the Predacon=
s would turn and chase the blur that had just sped by. If they hesitated he=
 would strike from behind.

Silver Scout sniffed the air, she could sense t=
he tension coming from all around her. Moving slowly she moved out of the c=
orner that she'd been hiding in.

Blaze searched carefully for Silver Scout=
. If anyone asked she'd make up a story but the tigress hoped she wouldn't =
run into anyone who knew of her orders.
